basic.description: This course is a survey of musical theatre in America since the 1940s, including Rodgers and Hammerstein, Weill, Lerner and Loewe, Loesser, Bernstein, Sondheim, the Black musical, and the rock musical.
basic.subject: THE
basic.title: Musical Theatre History II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: THE 3214, MUL 2211, DAN 4115, or instructor permission.
